shapecode_1_g=1.000
shapecode_1_b=1.000

shapecode_1_r2=1.000
shapecode_1_g2=1.000

shapecode_1_border_g=1.000
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.000
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=18
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=1
shapecode_2_num_inst=10
shapecode_2_x=0.463
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=1.60089
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_zoom=0.67634
shapecode_2_r=1.000
shapecode_2_g=1.000
shapecode_2_b=1.000
shapecode_2_a=1.000
shapecode_2_r2=0.700
shapecode_2_g2=0.800
shapecode_2_b2=0.800
shapecode_2_a2=1.000
shapecode_2_border_r=1.000
shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000
shapecode_2_border_a=0.000
shapecode_3_enabled=1
shapecode_3_sides=20
shapecode_3_additive=0
shapecode_3_thickOutline=0
shapecode_3_textured=0
shapecode_3_num_inst=160
shapecode_3_x=0.503
shapecode_3_y=0.500
shapecode_3_rad=0.05274
shapecode_3_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_3_tex_zoom=1.11234
shapecode_3_r=1.000
shapecode_3_g=1.000
shapecode_3_b=1.000
shapecode_3_a=1.000
shapecode_3_r2=0.000
shapecode_3_g2=0.000
shapecode_3_b2=0.000
shapecode_3_a2=1.000
shapecode_3_border_r=1.000
shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
shape_3_per_frame1=sample=instance/num_inst;
shape_3_per_frame2=r = .4*sin(sample*80);
shape_3_per_frame3=g = .8*sin(sample*66);
shape_3_per_frame4=b = .6*sin(sample*120);
shape_3_per_frame5=
shape_3_per_frame6=//////  shifter's cube
shape_3_per_frame7=
shape_3_per_frame8=it = it+1;
shape_3_per_frame9=sz = 1;
shape_3_per_frame10=ss = sample*6;
shape_3_per_frame11=ox = sz*.5*pow(-1,it)*below(ss,1) + .5*pow(-1,it)*above(ss,1)*sz*below(ss,2) + above(ss,2)*.5*pow(-1,it)*sz*below(ss,3);
shape_3_per_frame12=oy = (ss-.5)*sz*below(ss,1) + sz*.5*above(ss,1)*below(ss,2) + (.5-(ss-2))*sz*above(ss,2)*below(ss,3);
shape_3_per_frame13=oz = -sz*.5*below(ss,1) + ((ss-1)-.5)*sz*above(ss,1)*below(ss,2) + sz*.5*above(ss,2)*below(ss,3);
shape_3_per_frame14=ox = ox + above(ss,3)*below(ss,4)*-.5*sz + above(ss,4)*below(ss,5)*sz*(-.5+(ss-4)) + above(ss,5)*sz*.5;
shape_3_per_frame15=oy = oy + above(ss,3)*below(ss,4)*.5*sz*pow(-1,it) + above(ss,4)*below(ss,5)*sz*-.5 + above(ss,5)*sz*(-.5+(ss-5));
shape_3_per_frame16=oz = oz + above(ss,3)*below(ss,4)*sz*(.5-(ss-3)) + above(ss,4)*below(ss,5)*sz*.5*pow(-1,it) + above(ss,5)*sz*.5*pow(-1,it);
shape_3_per_frame17=
shape_3_per_frame18=
shape_3_per_frame19=//////rotations .... by flexi
shape_3_per_frame20=
shape_3_per_frame21=my_x=ox;
shape_3_per_frame22=my_y=oy;
shape_3_per_frame23=my_z=oz;
shape_3_per_frame24=
shape_3_per_frame25=d = 2.3;    
shape_3_per_frame26=zoom = 1;
shape_3_per_frame27=
shape_3_per_frame28=w1 = q1;
shape_3_per_frame29=w2 = q3;
shape_3_per_frame30=w3 = q2;
shape_3_per_frame31=
shape_3_per_frame32=x1 = cos(w1)*my_x + sin(w1)*my_y;
shape_3_per_frame33=y1 = -sin(w1)*my_x + cos(w1)*my_y;
shape_3_per_frame34=z1 = my_z;
shape_3_per_frame35=
shape_3_per_frame36=x2 = cos(w2)*x1 + sin(w2)*z1;
shape_3_per_frame37=z2 = -sin(w2)*x1 + cos(w2)*z1;
shape_3_per_frame38=y2 = y1;
shape_3_per_frame39=
shape_3_per_frame40=y3 = cos(w3)*y2 + sin(w3)*z2;
shape_3_per_frame41=z3 = -sin(w3)*y2 + cos(w3)*z2;
shape_3_per_frame42=x3 = x2;
shape_3_per_frame43=
shape_3_per_frame44=// perspective calculation
shape_3_per_frame45=
shape_3_per_frame46=l = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3);
shape_3_per_frame47=w = atan2(x3,y3);
shape_3_per_frame48=p = tan(asin(1) + atan2(d+z3,l));
shape_3_per_frame49=d = sqrt(x3*x3 + y3*y3 + (z3+d)*(z3+d));
shape_3_per_frame50=
shape_3_per_frame51=my_x = zoom*sin(w)*p;
shape_3_per_frame52=my_y = zoom*cos(w)*p;
shape_3_per_frame53=
shape_3_per_frame54=
shape_3_per_frame55=p1 = .03*sin(sample*(10+9*sin(q1)));
shape_3_per_frame56=p2 = .03*sin(sample*(10+9*sin(q2)));
shape_3_per_frame57=
shape_3_per_frame58=x = .5+my_x+p1;
shape_3_per_frame59=y = .5+my_y+p2;
per_frame_1=zoom=1;
per_frame_2=wave_a=0;
per_frame_3=warp = 0;
per_frame_4=decay=0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=//// Flexi's beat counter
per_frame_7=
per_frame_8=bt1 = bt1*0.95 + sqr(bass*2)*30/fps;
per_frame_9=mt1 = mt1*0.95 + sqr(mid*2)*30/fps;
per_frame_10=tt1 = tt1*0.95 + sqr(treb*2)*30/fps;
per_frame_11=bt2 = bt2 + bt1*0.003;
per_frame_12=mt2 = mt2 + mt1*0.003;
per_frame_13=tt2 = tt2 + tt1*0.003;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=q1 = bt2 *0.03;
per_frame_16=q2 = mt2 *0.03;
per_frame_17=q3 = tt2 *0.03;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    float2 d = texsize.zw * 2;
warp_4=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
warp_5=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
warp_6=`
warp_7=`ret.x = tex2d(sampler_fc_main, uv + float2(dx.x,dy.x)*texsize.zw*4).x;
warp_8=`ret.y = tex2d(sampler_fc_main, uv + float2(dx.y,dy.y)*texsize.zw*4).y;
warp_9=`ret.z = tex2d(sampler_fc_main, uv + float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw*4).z;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`ret -= (ret.yzx + ret.zxy)*0.16 + 0.001;
warp_12=`float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 1.2 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_13=`ret += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5) *0.04;
warp_14=`
warp_15=`}
comp_1=`float2 gradBlur1( float2 domain, float2 d, float3 filter){
comp_2=`   float3 dx = ( 2*GetBlur1(domain + float2(1,0)*d) - 2*GetBlur1(domain-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_3=`   float3 dy = ( 2*GetBlur1(domain + float2(0,1)*d) - 2*GetBlur1(domain-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_4=`
comp_5=`   return 0.5*float2(dx.x*filter.x + dx.y*filter.y + dx.z*filter.z,
comp_6=`                     dy.x*filter.x + dy.y*filter.y + dy.z*filter.z)/(filter.x+filter.y+filter.z);
comp_7=`}
comp_8=`
comp_9=`shader_body
comp_10=`{
comp_11=`float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
comp_12=`float2 grady = gradBlur1(uv, d, float3(0,1,0));
comp_13=`float2 gradx = gradBlur1(uv + grady*d, d, float3(1,0,0));
comp_14=`float2 uv_green = uv-gradx*d*8;
comp_15=`ret = (0.7 + (grady.x+grady.y))*GetPixel(uv_green-grady*texsize.zw*8).y;
comp_16=`float3 c1 = lerp(0,float3(1,1,1),GetPixel(uv - gradx*d*0).x)*saturate(1-GetPixel(uv).y*2);
comp_17=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(1,1.4,2.4), (GetBlur3(saturate(uv_green + grady*texsize.zw*8)).y-1.3*GetPixel(uv_green-grady*texsize.zw*8).y));
comp_18=`ret =  lerp(c1,1,ret);
comp_19=`ret = lerp(ret,float3(0,0,0),saturate(1*GetPixel(uv+grady*d*4 - gradx*d*16).z));
comp_20=`}
